Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Family | Fashion/Make-up | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Bravo ( USA)
Airs: Mondays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: August 13, 2012

Viewers are introduced to seven young women who dream of living a chic and fashionable existence in New York City. Chantal Chadwick, Kerri Lisa, Liz Margulies, Claudia Martinez, Angela Pham, Amy Poliakoff and Maggie Schaffer all share a passion for art, but are divided amongst their Manhattan and Brooklyn lifestyles with vastly different attitudes and tastes towards fashion, art and men. (Source: BRAVO TV)
